SEARCH
Package com.zoi4erom.strategygame.service.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.zoi4erom.strategygame.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Implementation of the interface providing functionality related to user management. This implementation includes methods for creating users, retrieving user data, updating user information, managing user alliances, and more.
